query: Set up the Telegram adapter so the bot can receive a user message and send a reply
expected_behavior: The Telegram adapter connects using long polling and receives an incoming text message
The raw Telegram message is normalized into a ChannelMessage with all required fields populated
The ChannelManager routes the ChannelMessage to the pipeline or agent
After agent processing, the outbound reply is formatted as Telegram HTML (bold, italic, code spans)
The reply is sent via the Telegram Bot API and the message ID is returned
